uid.description: Unique identifier of the dashboardWidget object

ownwer_app_code_name.description: The code name of the app that owns the widget

class.description: the vue class of the widget, determines the layout and functionality of the widget based on its related vue class

inid_data.description: a configuration object that is passed to the widget to initialize it. Can vary based on the widget class

min_width.description: the minimum width of the widget in grid units

min_height.description: the minimum height of the widget in grid units

max_width.description: the maximum width of the widget in grid units

max_height.description: the maximum height of the widget in grid units

created_at.description: The time the call was created

updated_at.description: The time the call was last updated

description: A widget that can be added to the dashboard to display information or functionality
